none: Four large tulips, and a border and some floral decorations around the text.  Yellow, green, blue, and white print.

Morrison, Alice Nadine
Morrison, Howell Oakdeane, 1888-
Pacific Northwest Sheet Music : from the Ashford Collection

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.
I know a place where the pretty tulips grow

Morrison, Alice Nadine
Morrison, Howell Oakdeane, 1888-

Front cover states that this song is the "Bellingham Official Tulip Song" and that it is "dedicated to the community service by Alice and Howell Morrison".  Page 2 also notes that this song is "dedicated to the Home Community Services".

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.
